articles.content: The soaring popularity of Jacinda Ardern, New Zealands Labour prime minister, and the widespread praise for her leadership make it hard to assess her track record honestly. The ascent of Ardern, a ch… [+11815 chars]

articles.title: Bombardier to end Learjet production, cut 1600 jobs - Fox Business
articles.description: The iconic jet was among the first private luxury planes. William Lear based his design in part on military jets. The first Learjet flew in 1963, and more than 3,000 had been built since.
articles.content:
WICHITA, Kan. — The Learjet, which became synonymous with lifestyles of the rich and famous, is about to fade into aviation history.

articles.title: Australia to introduce landmark Google, Facebook legislation to parliament next week - Reuters Australia
articles.description: Australia will next week introduce landmark legislation to force Alphabet's Google and Facebook to pay publishers and broadcasters for content, a senior government official said on Friday.
